name: Shattered Raider
description:
Before everything, there were only shapes. They fought themselves in an abstract war. But now there's only you, a Shattered Raider, chosen to fight till the very end.Embrace on a journey that will take you to the borders of your very imaginaton.

Controls

A/D: Rotates the player

Right/Left Arrow Keys: Rotates the player

K: Shoots

ENTER: Pauses the game

I hope this journey brings joy to you.
